alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pima County through 430 PM MST... At 345 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ajo, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument, Why, Charco 27, Gunsight and Kuakatch. This includes the following highways... Route 85 between mile markers 33 and 64. Route 86 between mile markers 53 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
